item.title: [317]::starter command error[317] help
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

noobsauce:

yes but note my server is BLANK and things like savemoreinfo(); and savechar; arent declared so i cant use them.and i dont know where to declare them

You can declare them pretty much anywhere… Find any void really and declare it under or above there.

item.title: [317]::starter command error[317] help
item.dc:creator: @noobsauce noobsauce
item.description:
@noobsauce wrote:

[quote=“klomp3, post:4, topic:304773”]euhmm, noobsauce, everyone can keep doing ::starter and get 10m
use this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 10000000); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but you can only do ::starter once."); } }
Then people only can do it once[/quote]lol i knew that before i started but i figured no one would do it…ive already coded that and i get errors.btw that looks like allstar coding.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]::starter command error[317] help
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

euhmm, noobsauce, everyone can keep doing ::starter and get 10m
use this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 10000000); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but you can only do ::starter once."); } }
Then people only can do it once

item.title: [317]::starter command error[317] help
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Your closing brackets are the wrong way round, and you have one too many.

	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {
		addItem(995, 10000000);
	}

From “is this because i coded it the very end of client.java”, you don’t seem to have a clue what your doing anyway.

It needs to be under the customCommand method.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]::starter command error[317] help
item.dc:creator: @noobsauce noobsauce
item.description:
@noobsauce wrote:

im using a blank source,and im trying to make a ::starter command…this is what i coded:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { addItem(995, 10000000); { {

and this is the error i get when i compile.

client.java:2585: reached end of file while parsing {-> 1 error

is this because i coded it at the very end of client.java?

Read full topic
